title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.14 - Additional (paid-in) capital
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.14 - Additional (paid-in) capital

State Regulations
(a) Contributions of corporate stockholders credited to accounts other than capital
stock. (b) Sources: (1)
an excess over par or stated value
received from the sale or exchange of capital stock; (2)
an excess of par or stated value of
capital stock reacquired over the amount paid therefor; or
(3)
an excess from recapitalization, often
displayed on the balance sheet as a separate item or in combination with par or
stated value and designated paid-in capital. (c) Known also as paid-in surplus. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
